input.name: name
input.description: The new project's name. Defaults to "Unnamed project".

input.name: data
input.description: Text containing data in a .csv format.

input.name: tree
input.description: Text containing data in a .nwk format to build a phylogenetic tree. Defaults to null.

input.name: network
input.description: Text containing data in a .fot format to build a network. Defaults to null.

input.name: api
input.description:
The url of the microreact api.
Defaults to `https://microreact.org/api`.

input.name: idField
input.description: The column, from the data input, that will be used as the id of each row. Defaults to null.

input.name: timelineField
input.description: The column, from the data input, that contains the timeline data. Defaults to null.

input.name: timelineFormat
input.description: How to format the timelineField input. Defaults to null.

input.name: mapLatitude
input.description: The column, from the data input, that contains the latitude data. Defaults to null.

input.name: mapLongitude
input.description: The column, from the data input, that contains the longitude data. Defaults to null.
